de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation

Class RectangleRevealAnimation.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractBuilder<AnimationType,BuilderType>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.DialogAnimation.AbstractDialogAnimationBuilder<RectangleRevealAnimation,RectangleRevealAnimation.Builder>
        • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.RectangleRevealAnimation.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    RectangleRevealAnimation

    public static class RectangleRevealAnimation.Builder
extends DialogAnimation.AbstractDialogAnimationBuilder<RectangleRevealAnimation,RectangleRevealAnimation.Builder>
    A builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(android.content.Context context)
      Creates a new builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size.

      Sets the width, which should be used by the animation, which is created by the builder.
